Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.Utils

Class AnimationStuff

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.Utils.AnimationStuff
public class AnimationStuff extends Object
A utils class that contains methods to create KeyValues for animations.
